TopicTitle: "You must select a prefix efile posting"?

Articles.Content:
It's a nice error message but not overly helpful on how to select a prefix.

I get it when trying to post to some of the other forums on KSP. I do see the [unanswered] prefixes but no way to add them. A little help would be appreciated as I'm obviously too dense to figure it out on my iPhone.

vBulletin is notoriously awful on mobile platforms. I just picked up my iPhone and couldn't find a way to select a prefix. It's pretty straight-forward and visible on the desktop version, though.

There's a button at the bottom of the main page (and on the post page, just not the preview) on the mobile that says "Full Site". Hit that and then try. You'll have to play with zooming and scrolling a bit, but that's the only way I can find to get it to work. Good luck.

Edited February 18, 2014 by Aphox

It also seems that if you have an infraction, you can not select a forum prefix at all.

I really want to post this:

Here's my wishlist for celestial bodies in future versions of KSP.

Main-Belt Asteroids

Ranging from rocks barely the size of Gilly to a bit bigger than Bop, these would be a collection of small planetoids around Dres. Among these would be tiny redirectable asteroids ranging from C-I class.

Trans-GP4ian/Trans-Joolean objects

Assuming that there will be 3 more gas giants to represent Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune, and that Eeloo orbits GP2.

these Small Gilly-to-Vall sized iceballs would include the Pluto analog, as well as other dwarf planets. Among these would be Asteroids with lower densities (to represent icy composition) and thus lower mass, ranging from size D-K.

Comets

Around 4 or so celestial bodies in highly elliptical orbits around Kerbol. These would begin to emit a glow and a tail when near Kerbol. (Under the orbit of Duna)

Laythe

Give Laythe volcanoes with functioning physics and damage to the spacecraft.

Eeloo (orbiting GP2)

Give it a cryovolcanic activity that can push a ship around, but does not damage it. Also a very thin atmosphere.

Tylo

Give it lots of tall cliffs over the surface.

Jool

Give it many many cloud layers to fly through, and a surface covered in an ocean that you sink through, but if you get far down enough the ship just gets crushed. Same with any other gas giants.

Moho

Give it an ablation effect similar to the comet tail effect.

Mun

Give it higher contrast and glow, but only from great distances.

But the Suggestions and Develoment forum requires a thread prefix and it won't work.

It also seems that if you have an infraction, you can not select a forum prefix at all.

Fixed
